audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization - reducing administrative burden in healthcare operations, allowing staff reallocation to core patient care. This is a replicable pattern across healthcare organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Acentra Health), specific quantified metric (60% reduction), appears to be from official case study documentation.

audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization with specific description of resource reallocation mechanism and outcome focus.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Transformation from reactive to proactive care through predictive analytics represents clear operational optimization of existing care delivery processes. Pattern is replicable across healthcare providers.

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing healthcare operations and administrative functions rather than business model transformation or new revenue streams.
